reviewText: This is a good collection of drug scare films that we were all subjected to in elementary school in the 1960s and 70s. They are campier and scarier than reefer madness, possibly because the drugs are worse. Pot is discussed of course, but mainly as a gateway drug to much more dangerous drugs, like heroin and LSD.Clean cut teenagers are shown going down the slippery slope into drug hell. Watch as they shoot up and become street trash. It's a hoot!
